titles.title: Fallen Timbers Battlefield, Fort Meigs, and Fort Miamis National Historical Site Act
To establish the Fallen Timbers Battlefield, Fort Meigs, and Fort Miamis National Historical Site in the State of Ohio.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.

bill.summary: 9/14/1998--Introduced. Fallen Timbers Battlefield, Fort Meigs, and Fort Miamis National Historical Site Act - Establishes the Fallen Timbers Battlefield, Fort Meigs, and Fort Miamis National Historical Site in Ohio. Authorizes the Governor of Ohio to designate, from a specified list of candidates, a management entity, which shall draw up a management plan for approval by the Secretary of the Interior. Prohibits the Secretary or any other Federal agency from making a limitation on fishing, hunting, or trapping a condition of the determination of eligibility for, or receipt of, assistance under this Act.
